Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'foul language'], 'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Scott Waugh'], 'Producers': ['Tom Lesinski', 'Louise Linton', 'Michael J. Mailis', 'Steven Mnuchin', 'Bradley Pilz', 'Greg P. Russell', 'Simon Swart', 'Tucker Tooley', 'Madison Turner', 'Scott Waugh'], 'Starring': ['Josh Hartnett', 'Mira Sorvino', 'Sarah Dumont'], 'Studio': ['Momentum']}
Review Text: Just not believable in terms of when he was in the woods "lost"  &  kept panting through his mouth.  No one is going to survive  when it is that cold breathing through their mouth.. .  It just wasn't that interesting in the forest.. it was too lengthy. & the rest was  sort of okay.
Review Title: Too long lost
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------

Christmas Collection (The Yule Log DVD) Il Divo (Actor), Various (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Sony Pictures Home Entertainment, All Sony Pictures Titles ["Featuring the world s greatest Christmas music set to your choice of three heart-warming holiday scenes, THE YULE LOG DVD lights up the holiday season. Perfect for entertaining, these songs and scenes instantly bring the good cheer and magic of Christmas to any holiday home.1. O Holy Night 2. White Christmas 3. Ave Maria4. When A Child Is Born5. Adeste Fideles 6. Over The Rainbow7. Panis Angelicus8. Rejoice 9. Silent Night 10. The Lord's Prayer"] {'Genre': 'Kids & Family', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Classical, Color, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Il Divo, Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '1', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '5.3 x 7.5 x 0.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'Item model number': '88697782929', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Classical, Color, NTSC', 'Run time': '36 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 19, 2010', 'Actors': 'Il Divo', 'Studio': 'Sony Legacy', 'Number of discs': '1'} This is a fun product. No one is going to survive when it is that cold breathing through their mouth.. . It just wasn't that interesting in the forest.. it was too lengthy. & the rest was sort of okay. Too long lost

actual_interaction.title: Too long lost
actual_interaction.text: Just not believable in terms of when he was in the woods "lost"  &  kept panting through his mouth.  No one is going to survive  when it is that cold breathing through their mouth.. .  It just wasn't that interesting in the forest.. it was too lengthy. & the rest was  sort of okay.
